publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4330 Bruce Crawford: Sexual Offences (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that, during Stage 3 of the Sexual Offences (Scotland) Bill, debate on groups of amendments shall, subject to Rule 9.8.4A, be brought to a conclusion by the time limits indicated, each time limit being calculated from when the Stage begins and excluding any periods when other business is under consideration or when a meeting of the Parliament is suspended (other than a suspension following the first division in the Stage being called) or otherwise not in progress: Groups 1 to 5: 35 minutes Groups 6 to 9: 55 minutes Groups 10 to 13: 1 hour 10 minutes. Supported by: Kenny MacAskill*
